name.title: Station's name
name.description: Name of the station as it is locally known. Translations are to be put in the info object

slug.title: A slug of the station's name
slug.description: Garanteed to be unique across all the suggestable stations

latitude.title: Station's latitude
latitude.description: Coordinates as decimal value. Paired with longitude

longitude.title: Station's longitude
longitude.description: Coordinates as decimal value. Paired with latitude

parent_station_id.title: id of the meta station
parent_station_id.description: A station can belong to a meta station which can be a city or a station.

is_city.description: Whether the station is a city. Not all cities are marked as such.

country.title: 2-letter country code
country.description: Code according to  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 specification.

is_main_station.description: Whether the station is considered the main station for the area. Not all main stations are marked as such.

is_suggestable.description: Whether the station can be input by a user

same_as.description: Links a station to another as a duplicate. Useful for identical stations with different UIC codes.
